name: Ouija Sleepover
storyline: Aiden is a 19 years old university student, with a big crush on his friend Dan, who happens to come over for a movie night. While preparing for the evening, Aiden stumbles upon a ouija board, left by someone in the garbage. As a joke, Aiden decides to bring the spirit board with him, not knowing, what else he just invited into his apartment.
summary: A queer horror rpgmaker game about bad communication.
